blogPost.title: Join us for Samvera Virtual Connect May 6th-7th: Schedule and Free Registration Now Available

content.value: You're invited to join us for Samvera Virtual Connect, May 6th - 7th, 2025
This free online event brings together repository managers, developers, technologists, and anyone looking to learn more about
Both daily sessions will include presentations, case studies, discussions, and Q&A opportunities --
See the full schedule on the Samvera Community wiki
The conference will be held entirely online via Zoom​ meeting mode, and all presentations will be recorded for those who cannot attend live.
​We can't wait to see you there!

openGraphData.og:description: Samvera™ is a vibrant and welcoming community of information and technology professionals who share challenges, build expertise, and create sustainable, best-in-class solutions, making the world’s digital collections accessible now and into the future. Samvera’s suite of repository software tools offers flexible and rich user interfaces tailored to distinct content types on top of a robust back end – giving adopters the best of both worlds.
